main.description: Official OpenNIMIS website - Open source nutrition information management system

ProductOverview.Summary: OpenNIMIS is an open-source nutrition information management system designed to support nutrition programs and interventions in low-resource settings.
ProductOverview.Description: OpenNIMIS provides tools for managing nutrition program data including beneficiary registration, program monitoring, reporting, and evaluation. It is designed to support various nutrition interventions such as supplementary feeding, therapeutic feeding, and nutrition education programs.
ProductOverview.PrimaryFunctionality: Nutrition information management system for program monitoring and evaluation
ProductOverview.Users: Nutrition program managers, health workers, community health workers, and program evaluators

Reach.SummaryOfReach: OpenNIMIS has been implemented in various nutrition programs to support monitoring and evaluation of nutrition interventions and programs.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: All maturity model assessments are self-reported by the funded organization leading the development of the global good.

Community.DescriptionOfCommunity: OpenNIMIS is developed and maintained by a global community focused on nutrition information management and program monitoring.

HostAnchorOrganization.name: OpenNIMIS
HostAnchorOrganization.description: Open source nutrition information management system

Sustainability.Description: OpenNIMIS is supported through open source development and community contributions.
